name: CornerWare
description:
Part of 2020's #LOWREZJAM and a bit of a collab with CornerSoft.

With such short time, here it contains:

-10 Microgames and... that's all it has.

I did the music and the sounds. PablosCorner did some sprites too for one microgame.

Controls:

ASWD, SPACE for the microgames.

F12 to change screen size.

Didn't have time to polish this however. But I later on will update this ^^ Give it a go!
